variation.name: SchemaRefExample
variation.description: 307.01 A schemaRef element MUST hold the URI of a schema. In this case it does.

variation.name: SchemaRefCounterExample
variation.description: 307.01 A schemaRef element MUST hold the URI of a schema. In this case it does not because the second reference to a schema actually points to an XML document that is a label linkbase.

variation.name: SchemaRefXMLBase
variation.description: 307.03 schemaRef elements MUST hold the URI of Schemas. In this case the requirement is not satisfied because the schema reference has to be resolved using the XML base attribute that ensures the schemaRef URI resolves to the XML document in the base directory. This document, however, is a label linkbase, not a schema. If the XML base attribute value is not used then the schema in the same directory as the instance is discovered and no issues are noticed.
